message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not comfortable going that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. Would you be willing to consider $10500?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to go a bit further and offer the product to you for $11200. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $10800. This is my final offer.
I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I'm going to make a new offer that's closer to my minimum price. I'll sell the product to you for $11500. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your new offer, but I'm still not comfortable going above my target budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $10250. This is my final offer.
I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I'm going to make a new offer that's closer to my minimum price. I'll sell the product to you for $11000. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I'm sorry, but I've reached my limit. I'm not willing to go above $10000. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $15000.
